name: Grapple-Magnet
description:
Another game that I made in the last 24 hours of train jam 2019, exclusively.

You're climbing a tower to defeat the leader of the flying "monsters(?)" and get your home back, which is the tower. Shoot your titular grapple-magnet and hooks and send yourself flying to make your way up, as there's no jump in this Gameboy-Color style game!

Controls (keyboard):
Arrow Keys - Movement
X - Grapple-Magnet

Controls (gamepad):
D-Pad/Left Stick - Movement
A Button - Grapple-Magnet
